ygData.subject: Re: in my opinion the best thing to kill 22-24
ygData.msgSnippet: How do you get into the library as a necro?  Gather shadows?  I m a dark elf, would that be a bit harder?  I don t know if I m kos to Erudites or not. Kaelrie
ygData.messageBody:
How do you get into the library as a necro? Gather shadows? I'm a dark
elf, would that be a bit harder? I don't know if I'm kos to Erudites or
not.

Kaelrie



> From: Clanof1@...
>
> I stumbled across a very very very good kill that is about lvl 20, and
> drops up to 10plat a loot (i got 9plat 12gold 4silver 2copper as highest
> loot). This is a paladin in erudin, named Ton Nicelot. his only faction
> hits are with Erudite paladins and the high council of erudin, not even
> guards. He is a great kill and spawns once every 5-8 minutes, giving
plenty
> of time to med.
> He spawns in the great library, at the top floor. You will not get
> attacked by guards if they see you pulling him. There is a way to exploit
> him but id rather not say, seeing as if everyone does it the GMs will fix
it.
> Suppossedly there are very few who know about this paladin, and seeing
as
> it is not well known, its not very camped. I made 150plat at the average
of
> 6plat a kill (sometimes you get 10 gold loot).
> Hopefully this will help everyone who does not know about this guy,
and
> maybe we all level up faster :0)
>
> Quae DarkStump, lvl 23 Gnome Necro of Veeshan
>
